title: Spalletti: Now I know more about the players I have at my disposal - Juventus
snippet: On Wednesday, December 10, 2025, at 21:00 CET, Juventus will host Pafos at the Allianz Stadium for Matchday 6 of the UEFA Champions League League Phase. Coach Luciano Spalletti and Pierre Kalulu spoke on the match against the Cypriots at a press ...

title: Spalletti urges 'sloppy' Cabal to improve despite Juventus winner | Juvefc.com
snippet: Luciano Spalletti on the sidelines ... am · Juventus manager Luciano Spalletti wants to see further improvement from Juan Cabal, despite his decisive contribution against Bologna....

title: Juventus appoint Luciano Spalletti as manager until end of season - BBC Sport
snippet: Juventus have appointed former Italy head coach Luciano Spalletti as their manager until the end of the season.

title: Spalletti: 'Most important Juventus win, but I have to be hard on them' after 1-0 victory
snippet: BOLOGNA, ITALY – DECEMBER 14: Luciano Spalletti, Head Coach of Juventus, greets Vincenzo Italiano, Head Coach of Bologna, prior to the Serie A match between Bologna FC 1909 and Juventus FC at Renato Dall’Ara Stadium on December 14, 2025 in Bologna, Italy.

title: Expected Juventus lineup vs Bologna: Spalletti delays formation change? | Juvefc.com
snippet: Luciano Spalletti (Photo by Alessandro Sabattini/Getty Images) Club News · December 14, 2025 - 8:15 am · Following a vital win in the Champions League, Juventus will be looking to bounce back in Serie A with a victory in Bologna.
